apple_vendor_description: The kiss emoji between two people on Apple devices, featuring a light skin tone and a dark skin tone, is beautifully rendered to express affection and romance. Appleâ€™s characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded edges give the faces a gentle, loving appearance as they lean in for a kiss. Realistic lighting enhances the tender moment, making this emoji a heartfelt way to convey love, passion, or a sweet sentiment between individuals.
